phrases.phrase: <title>Allowed Logo File Types</title><info>This setting controls which files types will be allowed when adding a logo for a player.</info>
Maximum allowed logo file size in MB

<title>Default Color Picker Color</title><info>This setting controls the default color picker color. When adding a player, all new color pickers will be set to this hex value. Do not start the string with a hash "#" symbol.</info>

Single = single-video player WITHOUT playlist and chapter buttons.

Interactive = multi-video player WITH playlist and chapter buttons
This setting will limit the amount of videos returned to players. It will have a direct impact on page load time as for each video loaded, a thumbnail is requested from Brightcove.
FLV video files only. Max file size is 5MB.

Pre-Roll Duration = Enter the total duration of your pre-roll in seconds. Max duration is 30 seconds.

Pre-Roll URL = Enter the URL you want users to go to if they click on your pre-roll video ad.
<title>Allowed Pre-Roll File Types</title><info>This setting controls which file types will be allowed to be uploaded for Pre-Rolls</info>

View Overviews This setting controls the videos loaded in a DVS player when a user selects View Test Drives. You can use this setting to filter video results by reference ID. It is case sensitive and wildcarded on both sides. Any portion of a reference ID may be used, for example, a specific year. Setting it to blank will return all available reference IDs for a specific make. Setting it to anything other than a valid portion of a reference ID will result in an error.

View Test Drives This setting controls the videos loaded in a DVS player when a user selects View Test Drives. You can use this setting to filter video results by reference ID. It is case sensitive and wildcarded on both sides. Any portion of a reference ID may be used, for example, a specific year. Setting it to blank will return all available reference IDs for a specific make. Setting it to anything other than a valid portion of a reference ID will result in an error.
Your message has been sent. Thanks!
Your DVS Name can be whatever you want (e.g. Jim's DVS).
Please enter the name of your dealership.
Your dealership's phone number for internet sales. You may use a custom call tracking number as well.
Email address where Get Price & Contact Dealer leads will be sent from the Dealer Video Showroom.
Full URL to your vehicle inventory page on your dealership website. These video parameters may be used to dynamic link to specific vehicle inventory: {year} {make} {model}

Your welcome message should be unique and at least 500 words long. Target your greeting around the virtual test drive, or interactive video experience your dealership is offering with the Dealer Video Showroom.
Please enter a Duration for your pre-roll video
Now Playing: Video Name Test Drive
<title>Google Maps API Key</title><info>Set this to your Google Maps API Key</info>
<title>Google Maps Default Zoom</title><info>Set this to the desired default Zoom level. Lower zooms out.</info>
<title>Video Select Related Limit</title><info>This setting controls how many related videos will be returned with the selected video when using the Video Select on DVS view.</info>

<title>Enable Subdomain Mode</title><info>In Subdomain mode, the DVS will accept requests for DVSs at their Subdomain address (dvs-name.domain.com). This setting will cause URLs to be rewritten to support this mode.</info>
<title>Long Description Limit</title><info>This setting controls how many characters of the video's long description will be shown before truncation and displaying the "more" link</info>
Please enter a name for your Dealer Video Showroom.
<title>JavaScript Debug Mode</title><info>Enable this to send diagnostic information to the console. This is not recommended for a production installation.</info>
Error: You must select at least 1 Make before previewing the player.

<title>New Years</title><info>This setting controls the model year(s) of vehicles returned when searching for models from the DVS View page's Video Drop Down Select Box and the DVS Player Edit page's Featured Models Drop Down Select Box</info>

<title>Global DVS Google Analytics ID</title><info>Setting a Google Analytics ID here will activate Google Analytics for every DVS, every DVS Player, and every iDrive Player. If the DVS also has a Google Analytics ID set, both sets of Google Analytics will load.</info>
<title>DVS: Video Filters, Overview Video Playlist</title><info>DVS Video Filter settings for the Overview Video Playlist</info>
<title>DVS: Video Filters, Video Select Drop Down Search</title><info>DVS Video Filter settings for the Video Select Drop Down Search</info>
<title>DVS: Video Filters, Related Video Select Drop Down</title><info>DVS Video Filter settings for the Related Videos return with the result of a Video Select Drop Down Search</info>
<title>Overview: Allowed Years</title><info>Specify Year(s) to include only vehicles from the Year(s) entered here in the Overview Video Playlist. Leave blank to include all Years.</info>
<title>Allow 1onOne Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include 1onOne Videos in the Overview Video Playlist.</info>
<title>Overview: Allow Top200 Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include Top200 Videos in the Overview Video Playlist.</info>
<title>Overview: Allow POV Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include POV Videos in the Overview Video Playlist.</info>
<title>Overview: Maximum Videos Per Make</title><info>Set this to limit the number of Videos included in the Overview Video Playlist for each of a dealer's selected Makes.</info>

<title>Overview: Maximum Videos</title><info>Set this to limit the total number of Videos included.
In order for all selected Makes to be represented, if the total number of Videos exceeds this number because of multiple Makes, the number of Videos per Make will be lowered until the total amount of Videos is less than or equal to this number.</info>

<title>Overview: Round Robin Sort</title><info>Example: If three makes have been selected by the dealer and eight Videos total are to be included in the Overview Video Playlist, AA, BBB, CCC, set this to false to leave the Videos grouped together on the Overview Video Playlist by make.
Set this to true so that a Video from each make appears on the Overview Video Playlist before two Videos of the same Make are added to the Overview Video Playlist, ABC, ABC, BC.</info>

<title>Video Select: Allowed Years</title><info>Specify Year(s) to select only a vehicle from the Year(s) entered here as the Video Select Drop Down Search Result. Leave blank to include all Years.</info>
<title>Video Select: Allow 1onOne Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include 1onOne Videos in the Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>
<title>Video Select: Allow Top200 Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include Top200 Videos in the Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>
<title>Video Select: Allow POV Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include POV Videos in the Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>
<title>Video Select: Maximum Videos</title><info>Set this to limit the total number of Videos included in the Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>

<title>Related: Allowed Years</title><info>Specify Year(s) to include only vehicles from the Year(s) entered here in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result. Leave blank to include all Years.</info>
<title>Related: Allow 1onOne Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include 1onOne Videos in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>
<title>Related: Allow Top200 Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include Top200 Videos in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>
<title>Related: Allow POV Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include POV Videos in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>

<title>Related: Maximum Videos Per Make</title><info>Set this to limit the number of Videos included in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result for each of a dealer's selected Makes.</info>

<title>Related: Maximum Videos</title><info>Set this to limit the total number of Videos included.
In order for all selected Makes to be represented, if the total number of Videos exceeds this number because of multiple Makes, the number of Videos per Make will be lowered until the total amount of Videos is less than or equal to this number.</info>

<title>Related: Round Robin Sort</title><info>Example: If eight Videos total are to be included in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result being of three different Makes, AA, BBB, CCC, set this to false to leave the Videos in the order they were returned from the database, the order in which they were added, which may produce seemingly arbitrary results.
Set this to true so that a Video from each make appears on the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result before two Videos of the same Make are added to the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result, ABC, ABC, BC.</info>

<title>Related: Force Same Year</title><info>Set this to true to only include Videos of vehicles of the same Year as the Video currently being played or last played in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>

<title>Related: Force Same Make</title><info>Set this to true to only include Videos of vehicles of the same Make as the Video currently being played or last played in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>

<title>Related: Force Same Model</title><info>Set this to true to only include Videos of vehicles of the same Model as the Video currently being played or last played in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>

<title>Related: Force Same Body Style</title><info>Set this to true to only include Videos of vehicles of the same Body Style as the Video currently being played or last played in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>
Error... looks like the engine won't start! Please reload the page or report the problem.
<title>DVS: Get Price Validation</title><info>Settings to control the Get Price Form validation</info>
<title>Name</title><info>If enabled, the Name field will require at least three characters.</info>
<title>Email</title><info>If enabled, the Email field will require a valid email address.</info>
<title>Phone</title><info>If enabled, the Phone field will require a valid US telephone number.</info>
<title>Zip Code</title><info>If enabled, the Zip Code field will required a valid US zip code.</info>
<title>Comments</title><info>If enabled, the Comments field will require at least 1 character.</info>
<title>Banner Sizes</title><info>Banner images uploaded by dealers will also be converted to these sizes.</info>
Open Graph Site Name, Video Specified (Meta)
{share_my_share_name} has shared a Video Test Drive with you from {dvs_dealer_name}
Check out this {video_year} {video_make} {video_model} video test drive from {dvs_dealer_name}.
<title>Overview: Allow New2U Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include New2U Videos in the Overview Video Playlist.</info>
<title>Related: Allow New2U Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include New2U Videos in the playlist of Related Videos as returned with a Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>
<title>Video Select: Allow New2U Videos</title><info>Set this to true to include New2U Videos in the Video Select Drop Down Search Result.</info>
<title>Maximum Gallery Rows</title><info>This setting determines the maximum number of gallery rows to display for each DVS Gallery page</info>
<title>Maximum Gallery Columns</title><info>This setting determines the maximum number of gallery columns to display for each DVS Gallery page</info>
<title>Welcome Greeting Maximum Characters</title><info>This setting controls the maximum amount of characters allowed in the Welcome Greeting</info>
<title>Sales Team User Group ID</title><info>Set this to the user group id of the Sales Team Members Usergroup.</info>
<title>1onOne Default Video URL Slug Replacement</title><info>This will control the default Video URL Slug Replacement value for 1onOne videos.</info>
<title>New2U Default Video URL Slug Replacement</title><info>This will control the default Video URL Slug Replacement value for New2U videos.</info>
<title>Top200 Default Video URL Slug Replacement</title><info>This will control the default Video URL Slug Replacement value for Top200 videos.</info>
<title>Append DVS Info to Video URL Slug</title><info>Set this to true to append the DVS Title URL, City, and State Video URL Slugs</info>
Video Page Title (video specific, meta title)
You've been invited to our DVS Sales Team
You have been invited to the Sales Team of the {dvs_name} Dealer Video Showroom. To join this Sales Team, please click here: {link}
<title>Dealer User Group ID</title><info>Set this to the user group id of the Dealers Usergroup.</info>
Your vanity URL is your permanent link to your DVS. As you type, you can preview it below.
